lexUnit.name: shelter.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a structure giving protection from danger or the elements.

sentence.text: We stopped and built a makeshift shelter to get away , as best we could , from snow that filtered its way through every opening to produce melt water that trickled coldly over us .
